refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.para: Used to control marked sections around the declarations of individual attribute lists.

refentry.refsect1:
Description
The *.attlist parameter entities provide marked sections around individual attribute list declarations. You can selectively include or remove attribute list declarations from DocBook by changing these parameter entities.
The following sections identify all of the attlist module parameter entities in DocBook.
&parament.attlist.gen;
